attributes.name: manufacture_date
attributes.description: The date the battery was manufactured UNIX Epoch

attributes.name: charging
attributes.description: Whether the battery is currently being changed by a power source

attributes.name: charged
attributes.description: Whether the battery is completely charged

attributes.name: designed_capacity
attributes.description: The battery's designed capacity in mAh

attributes.name: max_capacity
attributes.description: The battery's actual capacity when it is fully charged in mAh

attributes.name: current_capacity
attributes.description: The battery's current charged capacity in mAh

attributes.name: percent_remaining
attributes.description: The percentage of battery remaining before it is drained

attributes.name: amperage
attributes.description: The battery's current amperage in mA

attributes.name: voltage
attributes.description: The battery's current voltage in mV
